name: @nxus/core
description: A framework for building light-weight, event-driven data processing apps.

scripts.test: npm run compile && NODE_ENV=test mocha --compilers js:babel/register -R spec test/lib/*
scripts.compile: babel --optional runtime -d lib/ src/ && babel --optional runtime -d lib/test/support/ test/support/
scripts.postpublish: npm run docs-readme && npm run commit-update-docs
scripts.docs-readme: export NAME=`npm view . name`; export VERSION=`npm view . version`; documentation readme ./src/*.js --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --readme-file ./README.md -s $NAME
scripts.commit-update-docs: git add ./README.md && git commit -m 'Updated README API Docs' && git push

author: info@nxusapp.com
